thread.title: RENEE
thread.title_full: Redspot Car Rentals reviewed by RENEE

author: RENEE
title: RENEE
text: We were actually charged more than we were Quote: d for our hire car, also we have falsely received another rental agreememt at another location that we didnt make, and when tried to discuss via phone direct with red spot was quickly put on hold for a prolonged period of time then timed out and line hung up.
